title: Oil Drops as Easing Middle Eastern Tensions Reduce Supply Risks
description: Oil declined as tensions in the Middle East eased, reducing the near-term chance of potential interruptions to supply.
content: Oil declined as tensions in the Middle East eased, reducing the near-term chance of potential interruptions to supply.
